attributes.action: Arab Spring / Christain Winter in Middle East - and elsewhere
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Friends, I am extremely concerned about the the welfare (and ill-treatment of) Christians in lands where the so-called Arab Spring is occurring.
Marginalised, abused, ill-treated and compelled to flee their homes. This adds to the appalling list already known abusers, such as Iran, North Korea, Afghanistan,Eritrea, Cuba, Nothern Nigeria, Sudan (North)....the list goes on and on.
Please do all you can to redress matters for these very badly abused people.  Sincerely,  Raymond L hardway (Dr)
